ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Like precious gems of ruby and pearl.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who are as beautiful as rubies and pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They are like rubies and coral-stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They are like Yaqut and Marjan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: As though they were rubies and pearls.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: lovely as rubies, beautiful as coral --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (In beauty) like the jacynth and the coral-stone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [There will be] maidens as fair as corals and rubies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As though they are jacinth and coral.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As though they were rubies and corals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (In beauty) they are like rubies and coral.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As (lovely as) rubies and as (beautiful as) coral.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As though they were rubies and corals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: As if they were rubies and coral.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:58] It is as though they are rubies, in their purity, and pearls, in their fairness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (In beauty) like the jacynth and the coral stone.
